title: About
text:
Contact Me

title: Milla Nielsen
text: I am a senior at the University of California, Los Angeles, majoring in Statistics and Data Science with a minor in Data Science Engineering. My interests lie at the intersection of artificial intelligence and medical imaging. I have conducted research at the University of Copenhagen and expanded my expertise in deep learning through coursework at UCLA, focusing on its applications in medical image processing. My goal is to work at a company committed to using technology to make a meaningful impact on the world.

title: Milla Nielsen
text:
Let’s Build Something Cool!
I’m always open to collaborations in AI, machine learning, and data science consulting. If you’re working on something exciting, let’s chat!
📧 Email Me | 🐙 GitHub | 📄 View My CV

title: Experience
text:
📍 Pioneer Centre for AI – University of Copenhagen
🗓️ July 2024 – August 2024
- Developed and optimized a machine learning model using XGBoost to predict Alzheimer’s Disease using MRI biomarkers
- Implemented 10-fold cross-validation and grid search to fine-tune hyperparameters
- Extracted features from MRI scans using a 3D Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) in PyTorch, leveraging transfer learning
- Achieved a 0.84 validation AUC score when classifying between Alzheimer’s and non-Alzheimer’s MRI scans
🔗 Project Repository: GitHub – Imaging Biomarkers



📍 University of California, Los Angeles
🗓️ August 2023 – June 2024
- Trained and benchmarked OpenAI’s Whisper model for transcribing and translating Russian media clips
- Compared small, medium, and large Whisper models using word error rate and BLEU score
- Designed a pipeline on a UCLA Linux GPU system to process over 1,000 hours of Russian audio for media bias research

title: Experience
text:
Work Experience

Co-President – National Student Data Corps (NSDC), UCLA
📍 Los Angeles, CA
🗓️ February 2023 – Present
- Built an inclusive data science community of 500+ students, increasing membership by 80%
- Developed 10+ student-led projects, industry talks, and hackathons to introduce students to machine learning and data science
- Hosted workshops on Data Science, Tableau, NLP, Python, and Machine Learning
- Designed and maintained the NSDC UCLA website as a central hub for resources


Head of Consulting – UCLA Data Resolutions
📍 Los Angeles, CA
🗓️ March 2024 – Present
- Managed communication between 5+ startup clients and teams of 7 students, providing data-backed solutions
- Recruited and trained 20+ new project team members and 15+ new industry clients


Data Analytics Intern – YWCA Berkeley/Oakland
📍 Berkeley, CA
🗓️ August 2017 – June 2021
- Conducted social media impact analysis, increasing engagement by 20%
- Designed data-driven ad campaigns to promote financial literacy and human trafficking awareness
